author: Amos Zeeberg
title: Coronavirus Testing Is Coming Closer to Your Doctor's Office
description: The FDA still hasn’t approved at-home tests. But faster, more distributed tech is on the way to clinics and ERs—and is just what the doctor ordered.
content: If the story of the United States initial response to the novel coronavirus was one of federal health agencies utterly failing to provide enough testing, the story of the next phase is of the same organizations trying like hell to catch up. Just over a month … [+7083 chars]
